description.en: Bor is a Decentralized finance ecosystem and growth engine for your crypto. Bor Protocol connects you to the best available yield farming strategies. The smart Robo technology lets you analyze and gives the best options in real-time for DeFi trading and farming in one single platform. Robo advisory, investment/funds management, liquidity, borrowing/lending and more advanced trading products in a decentralized way, that enables you to earn more with your digital assets on yield farming with just one single place to add your liquidity.
